items.title: Code Mapper - A Security Code Scanning Tool

Disects codebases into domain modeling, semantic reasoning, data classification, terrain mapping, and taint propagation
Surfacing 3x more findings than a commercial SAST tool on the same target, including 2 attack surfaces the tool had no visibility into.
